welcome.title: Welcome to BrainBites!
welcome.subtitle: Your journey to smarter learning begins

slide1.title: Welcome to BrainBites!
bullets: Challenge your mind with fun quizzes

slide2.title: Meet CaBBy!
slide2.subtitle: Your friendly quiz companion
bullets: Lives in the corner during quizzes
slide2.mascotMessage:
Hi there! I'm CaBBy! üéâ

I'll be your friendly quiz buddy, hanging out in the corner of your screen during quizzes. I love cheering on learners and helping them succeed! üí™

I'll keep an eye on your progress and give you helpful tips along the way! üëÄ

Tap on me anytime for helpful hints, explanations, or just a friendly chat! ‚ú®

slide3.title: Ready to Begin?
slide3.subtitle: Start your journey to smarter learning and better screen habits!

scoreInsights.title: Tomorrow's Bonus
scoreInsights.loading: CaBBy is loading your time data...
scoreInsights.positiveMessage: Nice balance! You're getting bonus points tomorrow!
scoreInsights.negativeMessage: You went a bit over time, but that's okay - every minute counts!
scoreInsights.overtimeOnlyMessage: You've been using overtime - let's earn some time back with quizzes!
scoreInsights.savingsOnlyMessage: Awesome! Your time savings are earning you bonus points!
scoreInsights.readyMessage: Start your timer journey - every minute counts toward tomorrow!
scoreInsights.winningMessage: You're winning the time game! Those savings really add up!
scoreInsights.overMessage: You went over a bit, but hey - every minute of learning counts!
scoreInsights.earnBackMessage: No worries! Play some quizzes to earn time back and flip this around!
scoreInsights.amazingMessage: Amazing time management! Tomorrow starts with a head start!
scoreInsights.beginMessage: Start your timer and play quizzes! Save time = bonus points, overtime = small penalty. You've got this!
scoreInsights.proTip: Pro tip: Save time = +100 points per minute tomorrow! Use overtime = -50 points per minute. Balance is key!

notifications.carryoverBonus: Bonus! +{{points}} points from yesterday's leftover time!
notifications.carryoverPenalty: Starting with {{points}} point penalty from yesterday's overtime

mascot.incorrectAnswer: Don't worry, you'll get the next one!

timerWidget.title: Your Reward Timer ‚è∞
timerWidget.description: This shows your available reward time! Complete quizzes to earn guilt-free screen time. Check your notifications where I keep track of your screen time and reward time with a persistent notification so you won't remove it by mistake.

bonusPenalty.title: Tomorrow's Bonus/Penalty üìä
bonusPenalty.description: This shows your bonus or penalty score for tomorrow based on how much screen time you used today. Use your reward time wisely!

dailyFlow.title: Daily Flow üåä
dailyFlow.description: Complete goals daily to maintain your flow! Each day completed keeps it flowing, if you miss a day, the flow breaks.

difficultyButtons.title: Choose Your Challenge üéØ
difficultyButtons.description: Pick your difficulty level! Easy gets you started, Medium tests your skills, and Hard pushes your limits.

categoriesButton.title: Explore Topics üìö
categoriesButton.description: Browse different categories like Science, History, and Math. Find subjects that spark your curiosity!

dailyGoalsButton.title: Daily Goals & Rewards üéÅ
dailyGoalsButton.description: Complete daily challenges to earn time bonuses and maintain your streak. Check here for your progress!

leaderboardButton.title: Compete & Compare üèÜ
leaderboardButton.description: See how you rank against other learners. Climb the leaderboard by answering questions correctly!

readyToStart.title: You're All Set! üöÄ
readyToStart.description: Now you know the basics! Start with an Easy quiz to get comfortable, then challenge yourself as you improve.
